T02D2286:145a-1: d'a ki ni au pa ya shr'i dha ra mi sa ra bhi ra n'a ma /
T02D2286:145a-3: mkha' 'gro ma'i man ngag snyan nas snyan du brgyud
T02D2286:145a-4: pa gdung ba bcang pa'i gdams pa zhes bya ba
T02D2286:145a-5: / bla ma rje btsun rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2286:145a-6: rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2286:145a-7: bla ma rje btsun mchog dang byin rlabs 'byung ba'i gnas //
T02D2286:145a-8: rnal 'byor ma dang mkha' 'gro'i tshogs rnams la //
T02D2286:145a-9: gus pa mchog gis rab tu rtse gcig 'dus par byas nas kyang //
T02D2286:145a-10: skal ldan gdung ba gang zag dung ba gcad pa'i phyir //
T02D2286:145a-11: bla ma rnams kyi brgyud pa'i man ngag bri //
T02D2286:145a-12: de la rten gyi gang zag skal ba dang ldan zhing tshogs chen po bsags pa des /
T02D2286:145a-13: bla ma dam pa rnams yun ring bar bsten cing gdams pas rgyud yongs su bsgos par gyur kyang /
T02D2286:145a-14: gdams ngag gis goms par ma gyur cing /
T02D2286:145a-15: yid gdung ba mchad pa dag la rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis /
T02D2286:145a-16: slob dpon chen po dombi he ru ka la sogs
T02D2286:145a-17: pa rnams la brdar gsungs pa de dag bdag gis
T02D2286:145a-18: bstan par bya'o // de 'ang mkha' 'gro ma ro mas /
T02D2286:145a-19: slob dpon dombi he ru ka la lta ba'i gnas lugs brdar gsungs pa //
T02D2286:145a-20: til 'bru dang ni sgron mas phyogs kun gsal bar byed //
T02D2286:145a-21: sngags kyis btab pa'i dug ni sman gyi mchog tu gyur pa ste //
T02D2286:145a-22: rma bya'i zas ni gzhan du gyur pa yod ma yin //
T02D2286:145a-23: tsandan dri dang ri dags la rtsi'i dri bzhin no //
T02D2286:145a-24: chu zla dang ni rgya mtsho'i rlabs ni tha dad cung zad med //
T02D2286:145a-25: sol ba'i rang bzhin gang gi kha dog nag po dag dang mtshungs //
T02D2286:145a-26: ri bo chen po gang gis bskyod par mi nus pas //
T02D2286:145a-27: gangs ri'i chu ni gzhan du gyur pa yod min no //
T02D2286:145a-28: dper na dri dang sgog skya tha dad gyur pa med //
T02D2286:145a-29: nyi ma zla ba'i yon tan gsal ba yin //
T02D2286:145a-30: mkha' la bya 'phur rjes ni tshol bas rnyed mi 'gyur//
T02D2286:145b-0: @145b nam mkha'i khams ni rtog ge'i spyod yul ma yin no //
T02D2286:145b-1: mandala dag ni phyogs las thams cad rab tu snyoms //
T02D2286:145b-2: dper na ro langs dang ni sa pra ko ne bzhi na //
T02D2286:145b-3: dpa' bo ngo mtshar nor bu shel bzhin no //
T02D2286:145b-5: de dag ni gnas lugs kyi gdung ba bcad pa'i gdams pa zhes bya ste dang bo'o /
T02D2286:145b-7: // / de nas mkha' 'gro ma sidha dha ras /
T02D2286:145b-8: slob dpon dombi he ru ka la bsgom pa'i don brdar gsungs pa ni /
T02D2286:145b-9: gnas ni tshang tshing dag gam dur khrod du //
T02D2286:145b-10: bdag med pa yi mdza' mo dag dang phrad byas la //
T02D2286:145b-11: yid ni rab dga'i bsam pa yis //
T02D2286:145b-12: dper na las zin pa yi kyes bu bzhin //
T02D2286:145b-13: dman pa'i don stor nam mkhar khyer bar bya //
T02D2286:145b-14: chu bo chen po rgyun du bab pa bzhin //
T02D2286:145b-15: drang srong ku shu gtsang ma'i steng du gzhag / mar me'i rtse mo rlung gis mi bskyod dang //
T02D2286:145b-16: me long g-ya' med bzhin du gsal bar phyi //
T02D2286:145b-17: bu ni yid 'ong bral ba'i ma bzhin du //
T02D2286:145b-18: rus sbal dang ni mkhar gzhong nyi ma la //
T02D2286:145b-19: rtsal dang ldan pa'i 'phong slob brtson pa ste //
T02D2286:145b-20: bsdams pa'i brtson ni nges par grol bar 'gyur //
T02D2286:145b-21: sa le sbram las byas pa'i rgyan bzhin du //
T02D2286:145b-22: bu ram dag gi ro la myang bar bya //
T02D2286:145b-24: de dag ni bsgom pa'i gnas lugs kyi gdung ba gcad pa'i gdams pa zhes bya ste gnyis pa'o /
T02D2286:145b-26: // / de nas mkha' 'gro ma l'a mas slob dpon
T02D2286:145b-27: he ru ka la spyod pa'i don brdar gsungs pa
T02D2286:145b-28: ni / bag ma dang ni smyon ma'i tshul bzhin te //
T02D2286:145b-29: glang po btsongs la phag rgod gsad par bya //
T02D2286:145b-30: nya ni rgya mtsho chen por yangs pa che //
T02D2286:145b-31: nags rnams mo ya phung por rab tu bsreg / spyan gzigs zas la rag tu longs spyod bya //
T02D2286:145b-32: res 'ga' mgyogs pa'i rta la bzhon pa bya //
T02D2286:145b-33: gri gug rnon po'i mtshon cha dag gis ni //
T02D2286:145b-34: ce spyang dur khrod dag tu rnam par rol //
T02D2286:145b-35: 'dab chags khra yi rtsal ni shin du drag / wa ni dur khrod nyid du shin du gzhol //
T02D2286:145b-36: chang 'thungs pa dang yul rnams gzhol ba 'dra //
T02D2286:146a-0: me tog dag la bung ba @146a * //
T02D2286:146a-2: bu chung dang ni seng ge me long mtshungs //
T02D2286:146a-3: stag ni 'jigs pa med par kun du rgyu //
T02D2286:146a-4: lkugs pa dag ni kha las khyod ma 'da' //
T02D2286:146a-6: de dag ni spyod pa'i gnas lugs gdung ba gcad pa'i gdams pa ste gsum pa'o /
T02D2286:146a-8: // / de nas mkha' 'gro ma kam ka ro ma has /
T02D2286:146a-9: slob dpon dombi he ru ka la nyams su myong ba'i don brdar gsungs pa ni /
T02D2286:146a-10: dkar po chos ni zla ba'i rim pa ste //
T02D2286:146a-11: gzha' tshon dag ni nam mkha' dag la mdzes //
T02D2286:146a-12: gzhon nu ma yis ma smras ci ste go //
T02D2286:146a-13: 'khur ba chus bkang pa ni smra mi byed //
T02D2286:146a-14: khug rna lta bu sni [?] ba'i rnam pa yin //
T02D2286:146a-15: dbul po'i rang bzhin gter ldan shin tu ngo mtshar che //
T02D2286:146a-16: lan tshva chu nyid la ni rab tu thim //
T02D2286:146a-17: nam mkha'i nyams las 'da' bar mi byed do //
T02D2286:146a-18: bslus pa'i chos rnams la ni re bar mi byed cing //
T02D2286:146a-19: ral gri'i ngar ni snum gyis nyams par 'gyur //
T02D2286:146a-20: rgyal po dag ni rkun pos 'jigs mi byed //
T02D2286:146a-21: wa yis seng ge skrag par 'gyur ma yin //
T02D2286:146a-22: mkha' lding rnams ni mkha' las dpangs mi dma' //
T02D2286:146a-23: 'di nyid yin dang ma yin gang yang min //
T02D2286:146a-24: sus byas gang yin go ba su zhig yin //
T02D2286:146a-26: de dag ni nyams su myong ba'i gnas lugs kyi gdung ba gcad pa'i gdams pa ste bzhi pa'o /
T02D2286:146a-28: // / de nas mkha' 'gro ma ma tre yis slob
T02D2286:146a-29: dpon dombi he ru ka la 'bras bu'i gnas lugs
T02D2286:146a-30: kyi gdung ba gcad pa'i brdar gsungs pa ni /
T02D2286:146a-31: yi ge bzhi pa dag gis zla ba rgyas //
T02D2286:146a-32: he ru ka yi nam mkha'i ngang nyid de //
T02D2286:146a-33: rdo rje dang ni padma yi ge bral //
T02D2286:146a-34: kha tv'am ga ni nyi ma'i 'od zer bzhin //
T02D2286:146a-35: rdo rje dang ni ljon shing 'bras bu ste //
T02D2286:146a-36: bya ni ngang pa chu na rtag tu gnas //
T02D2286:146a-37: padma'i stong bu 'dab ma rab tu rgyas //
T02D2286:146a-38: da ma ru ni bung ba'i rtsi dang mtshungs //
T02D2286:146a-39: bdud rtsi skal ldan rnams la chu shel te //
T02D2286:146a-40: rin chen bdun la rgyal pos mnga' yang mdzad //
T02D2286:146a-41: rnam grangs rnams ni ras kyis shes la bkab //
T02D2286:146a-42: kun 'dar ma la bye brag gang yang med //
T02D2286:146a-43: rtsal chen rdzogs pa'i seng ge gangs la gnas //
T02D2286:146b-0: shel ni phyi @146b nang med par shin du dag
T02D2286:146b-1: / btso ma'i gser ni dri ma'i g-ya' dang bral
T02D2286:146b-3: de dag 'bras bu'i gnas lugs kyi gdung ba gcad pa'i gdams pa ste lnga pa'o /
T02D2286:146b-6: slob dpon dombi he ru ka la /
T02D2286:146b-7: gang du gsungs pa de dag kyang /
T02D2286:146b-8: gnyis med kyi rnal 'byor du bya ba'i brdar gsungs pa ni /
T02D2286:146b-9: rgyal po rnams ni rin chen skal bar ldan //
T02D2286:146b-10: sman pa bzang dang phrad par gyur pa las //
T02D2286:146b-11: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mun pa sel ba ltar //
T02D2286:146b-12: rus sbal rgya mtsho dag tu 'gro mi 'gyur //
T02D2286:146b-13: stobs ldan gyad kyis pha rol 'joms par byed //
T02D2286:146b-14: ri bo 'gyel na chu rnams 'brub par byed //
T02D2286:146b-15: nags khrod dag na rngon pa glu rnams len //
T02D2286:146b-16: me shel ras bal 'dus pas me 'byung 'gyur //
T02D2286:146b-17: gser 'gyur rtsi ni shin tu ngo mtshar che //
T02D2286:146b-18: chu dang bcas pa'i skye shing lo 'dab rgyas //
T02D2286:146b-19: sbur len nor bu dag ni sbur rnams sdud //
T02D2286:146b-20: shes pa rnams ni gzhan gyi lus la 'jug / spre'u rnams ni dran par ldan pa ste //
T02D2286:146b-21: mnyam pas 'gro ba dag ni sgrol bar byed //
T02D2286:146b-22: ga bur sbyor bas tshad pa'i nad rnams sel //
T02D2286:146b-23: dge slong bag dang ldan pa gso sbyong byed //
T02D2286:146b-24: rigs ngan rgyal po'i khab tu mi gnas te //
T02D2286:146b-25: bcad par gyur na t'a la'i lo 'dab med //
T02D2286:146b-26: sgyu ma mkhan po sgyu ma'i longs spyod mkhas //
T02D2286:146b-27: rgyal po'i bu mo rgyan dang rab tu ldan //
T02D2286:146b-28: gar mkhan rnams ni gar gyi rnam pa byed //
T02D2286:146b-29: sbrang ma rnams ni ngan skyugs nang du rgyug / ces gsungs pa ste /
T02D2286:146b-30: de dag ni gnyis su med pa'i rnal 'byor gyi
T02D2286:146b-31: gnas lugs kyi gdung ba gcad pa'i gdams pa ste
T02D2286:146b-33: / de nas mkha' 'gro ma be tos //
T02D2286:146b-34: bla ma zangs gling pa la kappu ra la zung 'jug gi rnal 'byor gyi brda gsungs pa ni ;
T02D2286:146b-35: khri snyan sa le snying rje ldan pa ste //
T02D2286:146b-36: ma ni bu la rab tu chags pa'o //
T02D2286:146b-37: bu ram shing las bu ram 'byung ba ltar //
T02D2286:146b-38: rgya mtshor phyin pas nor bu rnyed par 'gyur //
T02D2286:146b-39: chu yi nang gi zla ba sel mi byed //
T02D2286:146b-40: nor bu me shel rtsol sgrub dag dang bral //
T02D2286:147a-2: tshong pa tshong 'dus dag tu gnas par byed //
T02D2286:147a-3: rdza mkhan dag ni so btang rdza la spyod //
T02D2286:147a-4: sprin dang bral ba'i nam mkha' rab tu dangs //
T02D2286:147a-5: dmu rgod mi srun brtul bas zhon par byed //
T02D2286:147a-6: mdza' bo dag gis gsungs pas re ba med //
T02D2286:147a-7: rmi rmi lam sad pas dgra dang yongs su bral //
T02D2286:147a-8: khyim bdag mtshon cha'i 'khor lo rab tu rno //
T02D2286:147a-9: chom rkun rab tu mang bas mel tshe mkhas //
T02D2286:147a-10: chu rnams ma lus rgya mtsho ro gcig 'gyur //
T02D2286:147a-11: pha lam rdo rjes dngos po thams cad 'bigs //
T02D2286:147a-12: smig rgyu'i chu yis gdung bar mi byed do ;
T02D2286:147a-13: ; gzha' chon yal ba dag la sdug bsngal med //
T02D2286:147a-14: rmi lam rmis pa'i nor la ster mi byed //
T02D2286:147a-15: brag ca'i sgra la rang nyid dga' ba ste //
T02D2286:147a-16: bram ze chang 'thung ba ni shin tu gsang //
T02D2286:147a-17: rnal 'byor rnal 'byor rnal 'byor shin tu che //
T02D2286:147a-19: de dag ni zung 'jug gi rnal 'byor gyi gnas
T02D2286:147a-20: lugs kyi gdung ba gcad pa'i gdams pa ste bdun
T02D2286:147a-22: / de nas mkha' 'gro ma khanda ro has /
T02D2286:147a-23: slob dpon dombi he ru ka la /
T02D2286:147a-24: padmo kha 'byed pa'i gdams pa brdar gsungs pa ni /
T02D2286:147a-25: dbul po rnams ni nor med sdug bsngal de //
T02D2286:147a-26: nang byed mtshan mo dag gi dus su ni //
T02D2286:147a-27: rgyal po'i bang mdzod bdag nyid brku bar bya //
T02D2286:147a-28: ma skyes dpe med mdzes pa'i grogs brkus la //
T02D2286:147a-29: shin tu mgar ba mkhas pa'i lde mig gis //
T02D2286:147a-30: gze ma bzhi bsten sgo lcags dbye bar bya //
T02D2286:147a-31: slar yang sgo de dam du gcad par bya ;
T02D2286:147a-32: ; rkong gtan gzhug cing rked gzer bsdam par bya //
T02D2286:147a-33: sgo ba po de yongs su gsad bya zhing //
T02D2286:147a-35: btsa' med lcags las byas pa dag gi gris //
T02D2286:147a-36: rgyal po'i btsun mo dam pa mgo bcad de //
T02D2286:147a-37: dmag dpon chen po dug gis gsad par bya //
T02D2286:147a-38: mel tseb dang blon po rnams kyang bsad //
T02D2286:147a-39: de nas rgyal po'i bang mdzod kha phye la //
T02D2286:147a-40: gos bzang dag gis yongs su dril ba yi //
T02D2286:147a-41: gser dang dngul gyi ga'u kha phye la //
T02D2286:147a-42: phyogs med pa yi nor bu rin chen blta //
T02D2286:147b-0: mar me dang ni nam mkha'i bu mo'i @147b tshul ;
T02D2286:147b-1: / nyi ma dang ni zla bas bdud rtsi 'thigs //
T02D2286:147b-2: che bas che ba'i rab tu che ba nyid //
T02D2286:147b-3: rma bya khyi dang phag dang smyon pa nying //
T02D2286:147b-4: sha za bung ba shin du rol bar byed //
T02D2286:147b-6: de dag ni padmo kha dbye ba'i man ngag gi
T02D2286:147b-7: gnas lugs brdar gsungs pa'i gdams pa ste brgyad pa'o
T02D2286:147b-9: / // / de nas rnal 'byor pa te lo pas dpal n'a ro pa la /
T02D2286:147b-10: bla ma'i chos bcu drug pa zhes bya ba'i gdams pa brdar gsungs pa ni /
T02D2286:147b-11: sa gzhi bzang po dag gi thun mong la //
T02D2286:147b-12: blo dman rnams kyis las la ma zhugs shing //
T02D2286:147b-13: sdug bsngal nad kyis gzir ba bsal ba'i phyir //
T02D2286:147b-14: ded dpon lta bu dag gis sems bskyed la //
T02D2286:147b-15: mu tig 'phyang ba chen po gzung byas la //
T02D2286:147b-16: 'byung ba sa chu me rlung dbang du bsdus //
T02D2286:147b-17: rgya mtsho chen po bzhi nas rin chen bcal //
T02D2286:147b-18: sbrang rtsi'i bcud ni mar gyi snying por ldan //
T02D2286:147b-19: goms par bya zhing bzo la byang bar bya //
T02D2286:147b-20: phye ma leb dang ri dags bung ba dang //
T02D2286:147b-21: nya dang glang chen dag las rab tu grol //
T02D2286:147b-22: dug mdas ma phog phog kyang slar la gso //
T02D2286:147b-23: tha rgod chu yis rab tu bangs par bya //
T02D2286:147b-24: rab tu nor mang phyug cing shin du phyug / zhing pa'i las la rab tu gus par 'gyur //
T02D2286:147b-25: ma yis bu ni rab tu smin par byed //
T02D2286:147b-26: 'joms byed seng ge'i bla ma de dag la //
T02D2286:147b-27: lus ngag yid gus yo byad ci dgos dbul //
T02D2286:147b-28: gus par ldan pas de 'dra yang dang yang //
T02D2286:147b-29: rtsal med rten cing bsnyen bkur rab tu 'bad //
T02D2286:147b-31: de dag ni bla ma chos de rnams dang ldan
T02D2286:147b-32: pa'i sdig pa'i grogs po spang ba ste dgu pa'o
T02D2286:147b-34: / // / de nas rnal 'byor pa te lo pas /
T02D2286:147b-35: dpal na ro pa la slob ma'i chos bcu gnyis pa zhes bya ba'i brdar gsungs pa ni /
T02D2286:147b-36: gcan gzan mche ba dag gis ma rungs rma med pa //
T02D2286:147b-37: sdug bsngal btson ra 'di na yun ring nad kyis thebs //
T02D2286:147b-38: khang bzangs dam pa nad med bde ba yon tan ldan //
T02D2286:147b-39: klu yi rgyal po 'gro la char rgyun rtag tu 'bebs //
T02D2286:147b-40: dug sdong lo 'dab rgyas pa'i lo 'dab 'bras bu chags pa med //
T02D2286:147b-41: spu gri'i sor chags sprang rtsi'i ro rnams rtag tu spong bar byed //
T02D2286:148a-1: kun gsod par ldan pa'i skyes bu sems stobs ldan //
T02D2286:148a-2: rma yod bag yod gnas mi byed //
T02D2286:148a-3: mi bzad nad kyis gzir ba sman pa dag la rab tu gus //
T02D2286:148a-4: skom pas rab gdungs nges par btung ba 'ba' zhig sgrub par byed //
T02D2286:148a-5: rlan bral rus sbal rgya mtsho chen po mthong na rab tu dga' //
T02D2286:148a-6: mgo la me lces zin pa myur du sel bar byed //
T02D2286:148a-7: rin chen snod mchog de dag tu //
T02D2286:148a-8: ro mchog bcud kyis nges par 'gengs //
T02D2286:148a-9: mun pa dag la sgron me bzhin //
T02D2286:148a-10: skal ldan bya ba gsal bar byed //
T02D2286:148a-11: slob ma chos de rnams dang ldan pa bsten //
T02D2286:148a-12: de las bzlog pa spang bar bya'o //
T02D2286:148a-13: slob ma bsten pa'i gdung ba gcad pa'i gdams pa ste bcu pa'o /
T02D2286:148a-15: // / de nas mkha' 'gro ma kam ka ro ma has /
T02D2286:148a-16: bla ma zangs gling pa na kappu ra la 'khrul
T02D2286:148a-17: pa'i shes pa gcad pa'i brda brgyad gsungs pa ni
T02D2286:148a-18: / byis pa chung ngur gyur pa rnams kyis ni //
T02D2286:148a-19: me long bzhin la tha dad dag tu rtogs //
T02D2286:148a-20: shin tu blo gros dman pa'i ri mo mkhan //
T02D2286:148a-21: rang gis bris pa'i ri mo dag la skrag /
T02D2286:148a-22: mkhris pa'i nad kyis btab pa'i mig can dag /
T02D2286:148a-23: mthong ba'i yul rnams dag la chags sdang skye //
T02D2286:148a-24: ji ltar dar gyi srin bu dag gis ni //
T02D2286:148a-25: rang gi kha chu'i rnam pas 'ching bar byed //
T02D2286:148a-26: mi mkhas dman pa'i gang zag la de ni //
T02D2286:148a-27: sgyu ma'i 'phrul gyi rnam pas bslus pa yin //
T02D2286:148a-28: rgya dang rnyi la sogs pas ri dags ni //
T02D2286:148a-29: rang dbang med par rab tu bsdams par 'gyur //
T02D2286:148a-30: mi mthun dgra yis zin par gyur pa'i btson //
T02D2286:148a-31: lcags sgrog dam pa dag gis bcings gyur la //
T02D2286:148a-32: rmi lam na ni khri mon dong bcug pa //
T02D2286:148a-33: de tshe sdug bsngal mi bzod skye ba yin //
T02D2286:148a-34: bla ma bsten cing nges shes bskyed //
T02D2286:148a-35: gnyug ma goms par bsten par bya //
T02D2286:148a-36: 'khrul pa yi ni shes pa nyid//
T02D2286:148a-37: rig pa nyid de ye shes nyid //
T02D2286:148a-38: 'khrul pa'i shes pa spangs byas la //
T02D2286:148a-39: gnyug ma'i ye shes goms par bya'o //
T02D2286:148a-40: 'khrul pa'i shes pa ngo shes par bya ba'i gdung ba gcad pa'i gdams pa ste bcu gcig pa'o /
T02D2286:148a-42: // / lho phyogs kyi grong khyer du mkha' 'gro ma bi la de wis /
T02D2286:148b-0: @148b rnal 'byor pa'i smyon pa'i brtul zhugs la ri ta pa la la /
T02D2286:148b-1: de kho na nyid kyi rnal 'byor nyi shu brdar gsungs pa ni /
T02D2286:148b-2: zhing pa rnams ni rim gyi sa las la 'jug
T02D2286:148b-3: / shing rta dag ni 'khor lo gnyis dang ldan
T02D2286:148b-4: // dpe med nam mkha' nyid du gnas //
T02D2286:148b-5: rig pa'i mdangs ni thams cad 'bigs par byed //
T02D2286:148b-6: chu yi nang du autpala shin tu mdzes //
T02D2286:148b-7: rtog pa bral ba rgya mtsho chen po nyid //
T02D2286:148b-8: mun nag rab tu spangs pa nam mkha' ste //
T02D2286:148b-9: drang srong gnas pa shing lo'i gos //
T02D2286:148b-10: rtsal rdzogs seng ge gangs la da rung gnas //
T02D2286:148b-11: 'dab ldan bya ni mkha' la mthon por gcod //
T02D2286:148b-12: sman mchog be ta'i 'bras bu gdod nas grub //
T02D2286:148b-13: 'bru mar snod khyer skad cig tsam mi yengs //
T02D2286:148b-14: dka' thub can ni shin du bag dang ldan //
T02D2286:148b-15: ri yi khrod na ljon shing rab tu rgyas //
T02D2286:148b-16: bram ze 'jug ngogs dag na dri ma 'khru //
T02D2286:148b-17: thag pa'i 'jug pa lhod par lhod ;
T02D2286:148b-18: / gang+g'a'i chu ni rgya mtsho chen por 'bab //
T02D2286:148b-19: gdol pa dag ni rab tu slong mos 'tsho //
T02D2286:148b-20: mdzes pa rtag tu me long lta bar byed //
T02D2286:148b-21: ri rgyal ri bo mchog rab rtag tu brtan //
T02D2286:148b-23: de dag ni de kho na nyid kyi rnal 'byor nyi shu brdar gsungs pa'o //
T02D2286:148b-24: de kho na nyid kyi rnal 'byor shes par bya
T02D2286:148b-25: ba'i gdung ba gcad pa'i gdams pa ste bcu gnyis
T02D2286:148b-27: / de nas rnal 'byor ci to mas //
T02D2286:148b-28: rje btsun ri khrod pa la zag bcas kyi bde ba las su rung bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2286:148b-30: rten cing 'brel pa dag gi las rnams ni //
T02D2286:148b-31: phun sum tshogs pa thams cad 'grub par byed //
T02D2286:148b-32: dus rnams kunda zla ba rgyas pa yin //
T02D2286:148b-33: mun pa'i tshogs rnams nges par sel byed na //
T02D2286:148b-34: tsha sgo med pa'i zhing pa dag gis ni //
T02D2286:148b-35: 'bras bu'i nus pa yongs su skyed par byed //
T02D2286:148b-36: 'khor lo gnyis dang rab tu ldan pa yis //
T02D2286:148b-37: shing rta mgyogs pa'i shugs kyis pha rol 'gro //
T02D2286:148b-38: rten thabs mkhas pa rnams kyi chu lud kyis //
T02D2286:148b-39: zhing pa'i myu gu rab tu rgyas par byed //
T02D2286:148b-40: ji srid 'dab ma ma rdzogs pa yi bya //
T02D2286:148b-41: de srid 'jam pa'i tshang na rten par byed //
T02D2286:149a-2: bya ba gzhan dag btang nas tsandan snyegs //
T02D2286:149a-3: zo chu rgyud mo mkhan po 'dod par ni //
T02D2286:149a-4: chu rnams ji ltar bsring par byed //
T02D2286:149a-5: 'di ni thun mong ma yin gdams pa ste //
T02D2286:149a-6: rtag tu bla ma mchog la gus pa dang //
T02D2286:149a-7: tshogs bsags rgyud sbyangs pa yi spyod yul te //
T02D2286:149a-8: skal ba dang ni ldan pas 'bad par bya //
T02D2286:149a-10: de dag ni ting nge 'dzin gyi grogs stobs yan lag brdar gsungs pa ste bcu gsum pa'o /
T02D2286:149a-12: // / dur khrod chen po ha har sgrogs pa zhes
T02D2286:149a-13: bya bar slob dpon chen po dombi he ru kas
T02D2286:149a-14: / tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i mchod pa'i dus su /
T02D2286:149a-15: 'du bar 'os pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams la 'di skad ces gsungs so //
T02D2286:149a-16: rdo rje slob dpon du gyur pa rnams kyis bab
T02D2286:149a-17: col du bdud rtsi chu bo lta bu'i gdams ngag
T02D2286:149a-18: mi bya bar / gdams pa bran ltar rang dbang med pa'i mi rnams la //
T02D2286:149a-19: rje bo bzhin du bde ba'i dus skabs med //
T02D2286:149a-20: g-ya' ma phyis pa'i me long ngos dag la //
T02D2286:149a-21: bzhin ni gzugs brnyan gsal bar gyur pa med //
T02D2286:149a-22: rgyu dang bral ba'i gzhung dang 'phong mkhan dang //
T02D2286:149a-23: rtsal dang ldan yang srid mi byed //
T02D2286:149a-24: snod nang ma bkrus shin tu btsog pa'i nang //
T02D2286:149a-25: ro mchog zas bzang dag gis 'gengs pa med //
T02D2286:149a-26: tshad ldan zhing pa mkhas pa dag rnams kyis //
T02D2286:149a-27: dus min sa bon 'debs pa yongs su spong //
T02D2286:149a-28: rkun po blo gros gzhan la gtams pas na //
T02D2286:149a-29: brkus par gyur kyang sdug bsngal rtag tu skyes //
T02D2286:149a-30: gtsub shing yan lag rdzogs par ma gyur pa //
T02D2286:149a-31: me ni 'byung bar rung ba nam yang med //
T02D2286:149a-32: bag yod blo ldan mkhas pa gang zhig gis //
T02D2286:149a-33: zhabs med snod du bcud rnams blugs mi byed //
T02D2286:149a-34: 'bru mar 'bar bar me 'dod skyes bu ni //
T02D2286:149a-35: rtag tu rlung rnams g-yo bar byed cing gnas//
T02D2286:149a-36: dug can sprul ni mkhas pa dag rnams kyis //
T02D2286:149a-37: mthong bar mi 'dod thag ring yongs su spong //
T02D2286:149a-39: de dag ni slob dpon dombi ha ru kas rdo
T02D2286:149a-40: rje slob dpon du gyur pa rnams la bdud rtsi
T02D2286:149a-41: lta bu'i man ngag snod ma brtags pa rnams la
T02D2286:149b-0: mi bstan pa ste @149b bcu bzhi pa'o /
T02D2286:149b-2: // / rje btsun n'a ro pas bla ma gangs gseng pa la /
T02D2286:149b-3: nor bu rin po che ngos gzung ba'i gdams ngag bstan pa ni /
T02D2286:149b-4: nang gi mun pa'i rgya mtsho chen po ru //
T02D2286:149b-5: rin thang med pa'i nor bu ra ba stor bas //
T02D2286:149b-6: ze ma lnga dang rab tu ldan pa yis //
T02D2286:149b-7: mche ba gnyis gtsigs phag pa zos par 'gyur //
T02D2286:149b-8: lcags sna gsum las brdungs pa'i ral gri yis //
T02D2286:149b-9: phag pa'i sha dang rus pa so sor dbye //
T02D2286:149b-10: de nas nor bu rin chen btsal bar bya //
T02D2286:149b-11: rnyed par gyur na chu yis bkru //
T02D2286:149b-12: de nas rgyal mtshan rtse la phyar bar bya //
T02D2286:149b-13: 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba gdab pas 'byung //
T02D2286:149b-14: dri ma med pa'i nor bu rin chen de //
T02D2286:149b-15: nges par nam mkha'i dkyil du sba bar bya //
T02D2286:149b-16: nor bu lhun po ri yi rtse la gzhag / nor bu me dang chu yis rab tu btul //
T02D2286:149b-17: nor bu bya yi 'dab ma gdags par bya //
T02D2286:149b-18: nor bu chu bo chen po'i gzhung la bskur //
T02D2286:149b-19: nor bu mar me'i ngos la bstan par bya //
T02D2286:149b-20: nor bu smon pa'i lag tu gtad la gzhag /
T02D2286:149b-21: nor bu me long ngos la bstan la gzhag /
T02D2286:149b-22: nor bu ras bal phung po'i steng du gzhag /
T02D2286:149b-23: nor bu rin chen dri za'i grong du bcol //
T02D2286:149b-24: nor bu rin chen rgyal po'i gter du sba bar bya //
T02D2286:149b-25: nor bu rin chen me dpung dkyil du sba ;
T02D2286:149b-26: ; nor bu rin chen rkun po'i nor nyid yin //
T02D2286:149b-27: nor bu rin chen shel gyi steng du gzhag / nor bu nor can bstan pa'i nor //
T02D2286:149b-28: nor bu'i nor ni btsal zhes gsungs pa ste //
T02D2286:149b-29: de dag ni ye shes kyi nor bu ngos gzung ba'i thabs brdar gsungs pa'o //
T02D2286:149b-30: rang gi gnyug ma'i de kho na nyid kyi ye
T02D2286:149b-31: shes ngos gzung ba'i gdung ba gcad pa'i gdams pa
T02D2286:149b-34: // / slob ma skal ldan tshogs bsags rin chen lta bu'i gang zag 'di //
T02D2286:149b-35: dpag tu med pa'i gdams ngag rnams kyis rgyud dag yongs su sbyangs gyur kyang //
T02D2286:149b-36: gdung ba chad par ma gyur bla ma rnams kyis yongs su gdungs gyur pa //
T02D2286:149b-37: gdams ngag rnams dang bla ma'i gdung ba gcad phyir brgyud pa'i man ngag bkod //
T02D2286:149b-38: rje btsun mchog dang rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i tshogs rnams bzod mdzod la //
T02D2286:149b-39: de las byung ba'i dge ba zla ba lta bu'i dri ma med pa des //
T02D2286:150a-1: kyi gdung ba yongs su gcad par gyur nas kyang //
T02D2286:150a-2: phyag rgya chen po'i dri med sa la ma lus
T02D2286:150a-3: yongs su rdzogs gyur cig / mkha' 'gro ma'i gdams
T02D2286:150a-4: ngag snyan nas snyan du brgyud pa'i gdung ba gcad
